name: World Neverland 2 Plus: Pluto Kyouwakoku Monogatari
overview: World Neverland 2 Plus: Pluto Kyouwakoku Monogatari (ワールド・ネバーランド2 プラス ～プルト共和国物語～) is a simulation game for the Sega Dreamcast. It is an enhanced version of World Neverland 2, originally released on the PlayStation and sequel to World Neverland Plus: Orurudo Oukoku Monogatari, also released for the Dreamcast.
